summary: Provides the DVC command‑line interface for all experiment‑related operations, including creating, executing, listing, displaying, comparing, branching, cleaning, pushing, pulling, renaming, saving, and removing experiments, as well as auxiliary helpers for argument parsing and queue processing.
business_intent: Allows data science teams to manage the full lifecycle of machine‑learning experiments within DVC, ensuring reproducible runs, easy versioning, collaboration, and synchronization of experiment artifacts across local and remote repositories.
